column4: FAW Group to invest in Chinese-funded EV startup Byton - Byton CEO
column5: BEIJING  April 20 China's state-owned automaker FAW Group agreed to invest a "significant amount of money" in Chinese-funded electric vehicle startup Byton  the startup's co-founder and chief executive  Carsten Breitfeld  said on Friday.
